SEARCH
Package observer

Class TestGradingObserver

java.lang.Object
observer.TestGradingObserver
All Implemented Interfaces:
TestMarkingListener
public class TestGradingObserver extends Object implements TestMarkingListener
This class implements the TestMarkingListener interface and is responsible for tracking the results of tests marked as passed or failed. It maintains a list of test results and provides methods to display or reset the results. The observer also keeps count of the total passed and failed tests.

This class is used to monitor the progress and outcome of tests during grading and provide insights into the overall performance of a student's submission.

Author:
jalenearmstrong

      Stores the result of a specific test, including its class name and the result.
      Parameters:
      testClassName - the name of the test class.
      testResult - true if the test passed, false if it failed.
